page.title: 09LIVING IN DENBY
page.content: Denby is a clean, nice, quiet village in the west of our region. It is a very friendly village and it is safe for children to play. It has disadvantages though, they are that there are only three buses a day and if you do not drive it could be very isolated. The houses are very old as they were built years ago and are mostly farmhouses. Denby has changed quite alot. The houses used to have thatched roofs and they used to be old fashioned, but it has altered now. (It is stil nice and has good schools). The people prefered it as it was. Their main complaint is the shopping facilities which need improving. Some of the land is woodland and vegetation and there is also a large area of derelict land.
